tool_description: Organizes, categorizes, and validates property photographs with metadata extraction, quality assessment, and compliance checking for appraisal documentation standards.

photo_paths.description: Array of file paths to property photographs

property_address.description: Address of the photographed property for organization

minimum_resolution.description: Minimum acceptable image resolution in pixels

auto_categorize.description: Automatically categorize photos based on content analysis

extract_metadata.description: Extract and validate photo metadata including date, GPS, camera info

quality_check.description: Perform quality assessment for clarity, lighting, and composition

error_messages: Photos not found: One or more specified photo paths do not exist or are inaccessible.
Invalid file format: All photos must be in supported formats (JPEG, PNG, TIFF).
Resolution too low: One or more photos do not meet the minimum resolution requirement.
Missing required categories: Photos for required categories are missing from the collection.
Metadata extraction failed: Unable to extract metadata from one or more photos.
Quality assessment failed: Photos do not meet minimum quality standards for appraisal documentation.
Too many photos: Maximum of 100 photos can be processed at once.
usage: Provide paths to property photos and the property address. Optionally specify required photo categories, quality standards, and processing options for comprehensive photo documentation.

photo_categories.description: Categorized list of photos by type (exterior, interior, detail, etc.)

quality_summary.description: Overall quality assessment of the photo collection

missing_categories.description: List of required photo categories that are missing

metadata_summary.description: Summary of extracted metadata including date ranges and equipment used

compliance_status.description: Compliance status with appraisal photo documentation standards
